Keywords: Avengers , Champions , Council of Kangs , Future , Past , Warp World , Young Avengers
Real Name: Kamala Kang
Special Powers
I CAN FIX THIS!: Shape Change. When Ms. Kang uses it, after rolling you may KO any number of friendly Chronal Echo bystanders to increase the result by X where X is the number of Chronal Echo bystanders you KO'd.
I KNOW THIS HAPPENS...: Probability Control. When Ms. Kang uses it, after resolutions you may generate a Chronal Echo bystander [MAX 3].
THIS IS ALL WRONG!: STOP. Barrier. // When Ms. Kang would take damage from an attack, you may instead KO a friendly Chronal Echo bystander within range and then place Ms. Kang in the square it last occupied.

Comments
November 11, 2022
Sylpharium
Pulled her today. Initially I wrote this off as the token defect chase, the bummer pull. The one I knew I'd get in at least one brick. But after a couple games, I eat my words. She's solid. 2 probs and an outwit per turn and a pseudo-can't die figure. Excellent utility figure for any Avengers build. I gave her the Carter Shield and the 19 Defend was pretty useful for a few attacks. Plus she gets to sling Sakaarian around. Glad I pulled her.
